formula: a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) / r^n, where r = 0.99355002995970290924151689720077885406082615338... is the root of the equation cosh(r) = tan(r). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: Log[ 1+Tan[ x ]/Cosh[ x ] ]CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Sech[x]*Tan[x]], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
